PersonalStatement.text: Nicholas Cruz, born on 1975-01-03, is a Male based in North Brian, Nicaragua. He is Married and holds Korean nationality. Currently working at Manning Ltd.

WorkExperience.text: Data Analyst at Harrison-Shelton from 2015 to 2018.
Senior Research Scientist at Manning Ltd, 2020 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from École Normale Supérieure de Lyon
Master's in Engineering from University of Missouri, Kansas City

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys playing tennis.
